img_above_text:
# Gray-Bronze Cart
Gray-Bronze Cart is a Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you'll go up against at the start of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. Blocking the pathway to the Ashen Pass II, the cart is just one of the Five Element Carts you'll need to fight in this Chapter.
## How to Find Gray-Bronze Cart

As you come outside of the cave, you'll need to go left and up a narrow path. At the other end of it, the next element cart blocks your progress.

img_summary: The image depicts a narrow, ominous pathway surrounded by intricately carved stone pillars featuring grotesque faces, leading to a distant, foreboding structure. The pathway, described in the preceding text, is the route players must take after exiting a cave and heading left, ultimately encountering the next elemental cart blocking progress toward the Ashen Pass II. The image visually complements the guide's instructions for finding this challenging encounter.
